0. ''Availability:''<nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/d/desktop-effects-kde/]]</nowiki>

0. ''Rationale:''
** Provide easy compiz installation and configuration for Kubuntu users 
0. ''Security:''
** Any binaries running as root or suid/sgid ? Yes, an Xsession.d script which looks in the user's Home DIR for a config file in order to set $KDEWM correctly.
** Network activity: No ports opened
** Any source code review performed? No

** There are no debconf questions in the packaging
** <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~kubuntu-users/guidance/desktop-effects-kde]]</nowiki> is the code repository, there is no upstream as development is done by the Kubuntu community.
** Bugs are tracked through <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/desktop-effects-kde/]]</nowiki>
